Name: A.B.C. Cocktail
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Wonderfully delicate. Mint gives subtle freshness to the classic port and brandy combo.
History: Not to be confused with the earlier and quite different cocktail of the same name which appears in the 1929 book, Cocktails de Paris Présentés Par RIP . This version, the one that has found longevity, first appears in the 1935 menu cocktail book Bar la Florida Cocktails .
